title: When opening all of my bookmarks in a bookmark fodler it automatically switches tabs
content: When I use the Open All Bookmarks option on a bookmark folder Firefox automatically switches to the first tab that is opened from the folder. Does Firefox have an option to allow you stay on the current tab you are on when you use the Open All Bookmarks option from a folder?
creator: pochly85

title: Firefox is unresponsive on M1 Pro Ventura
content:
On all builds of Firefox, it's extremely unresponsive on the second public beta of Ventura. I had updated earlier in the day and Firefox worked perfectly, but in the past hour or so it's become unusable. The video shown is using a fresh install of Firefox.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c3e3BLQvoX5yemDK1eqT7bMjstRvAkVU/view?usp=sharing
creator: matthew.ogawa

title: Firefox sending constant messages about adblocker slowing down service
content: I am fine with the fact that ad-blocker is slowing down my service. I would rather that than have organizations like google tracking my every move so I am OK with the slowdowns. What I am NOT OK with is CONSTANT messages from my browser telling me about the slowdowns. Can the Messages be acknowledged then stopped? The constant interruption of my browsing by these messages is far more annoying than the slowdowns themselves. Thank you for any assistance you might render.
creator: Ilaadrien

title: firefox scaling
content: Hello. Windows system, firefox update came, the size of the top bar is extremely large, while the system scale is 125%, and in the firefox itself 100%. Such actions were the reason for leaving chrome. Does history repeat itself?
creator: boiko.artem

title: Failed ESR update, not compatable with old operating system. Seemd to have replaced old ESR with 77.0.1 (64-bit)
content: Firefox was crashing, installed update under "about firefox". Launched and error said: Needs newer version of operating system. What to do? Have followed all the help articles and it does not see my previous profile only the new profile shows.
creator: rick.dehoff

title: Unable to play video message:  No video with supported format and MIME type found.
content: My daughters school has an on-line web portal and my daughter is unable to watch her school videos via Firefox. We can view them using Chrome & Edge. Please advise. I've watched and attempted to resolve the issue via the most current prescribed fixes on Google / Youtube and none of them have worked. Please advise. I'm running your Window MSIX package / mozilla-MSIX - 1.0 / 102.0.1 (64-bit).
creator: Joemiller64

title: Scrollin comments on NY Times
content: bold textIn my new computer (windows 11) I am having difficulty reading the comments on NY Times article. Now there is only one scrollbar, scrolling the article, and it is difficult/impossible to scroll down the comments. The image on the right (without the photo) is from Firefox. The image on the left (with the photo) is from Edge. As you can see, on Edge there are two scrollbars, one for the article and one for the comments. Can you help?
creator: yonatanhorowitz

title: online banking for 53.com
content: Every time firefox updates it won't let me log into my 53.com online banking. How to fix???
creator: whitebird512

title: xpcom
content:
hi folks, xpcom can not be opened or something of the sort. the file name contains xpcom. when this happens firefox locks up and cannot be restarted. this problem started about the first of July, 2022. i have uninstalled, refreshed, reinstlled. refresh did not change anything within a week the problem reaccured. this last time i only uninstalled it. used another browser that cam with the computer to reinstall. the system is windows 7 homepremium x64 bit. asus brand computer tower not a laptop. any help you can give will be most helpful. i have been using firefox since netscape went under. i have owned an operated computes for over 30 years. i can not figure this one out. help me....

garymichaelduke@aol.com
creator: garymichaelduke

title: Mozilla Firefox version 103
content:
Mozilla Firefox, version 103 for Windows now automatically attempts to connect to a URL Botnet site, https://ap.lijit.com/rtb/bid?src=prebid_prebid_6.18.0. My AVG Internet Security stops these continuous attempts and shows the path is c:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\Firefox.exe.

This is very concerning, and I am uncertain exactly what to do. I have manually downloaded this version again today and nothing changes.

My email is crhopple@earthlink.net.

Please advise, Chuck Hopple
creator: crhopple

title: On my yahoo home page the Fox News links do not work.  Click any of them and I come back to https://my.yahoo.com/
content: This started about 1 week ago. The links also don't work starting FF in safe mode. The links on my yahoo home page work fine on Edge. See attached screen shot image. And on some sites paying with PayPal does not work - as others have noted.
creator: jloser

title: Firefox display changed
content: I upgraded my video card in windows 10 64 bit. The card lets me connect through HDMI finally. But Firefox won't display as before. It now looks like the version of Firefox for my linked cell phones after trying multiple restore efforts. Did Firefox change so the desktop version looks like it was made for my phone? I linked my phone and it seems to have overwritten my desktop settings. Are they recoverable, as in older recent backups of my data still saved somewhere on your server? Thanks much!
creator: keepernsol

title: Last update issues & problems
content: After the last update all my internet based sites & email have enlarged text making some screens unusable - Have to reduce zoom to 67% How can I get a resolution for this
creator: JH2103

title: Download History - remove "delete" option
content:
Hi,

Is there a way to remove the "delete" option when right clicking on items in the download history? It's unfortunately right above 'remove from history' and easy to mis-click. It has no confirmation and permanently deletes the file(s) without sending to the recycle bin which is quite annoying - especially as I'm not sure why you'd want to use this menu to delete something you just downloaded.

Thanks
creator: lemming3k
